name: Bobby Balloon
description:
Bobby Balloon is a physics-platformer about keeping your balloons safe while traversing a vast world as a joyful chicken. Be careful to not make your balloons pop!

Once you're done playing, go back to the Main menu and try the unlocked HARD MODE!

Highscores don't work in browser :(

The game was created within 48 hours  for the GMTK Jam 2021 with the theme 'joint together' by Dominikus Bertl, Ana Laura Martinez, Manuel Wagner and Jan Plähn.

Controls

WalkWASD/Arrow KeysLeft Gamepad JoystickJumpSpacebarAny Gamepad Button

Additional Assets

Background image and UI by Kenney

Main music by  Kevin McLeod

Hard mode music by XTaKeRuX
